verses.verse: And David <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H1004>houses<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>; and he <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> for it a <S%H168>tent<s%>.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, None ought to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> but the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: for them hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto him <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>at<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto its <S%H4725>place<s%>, which he had prepared for <S%H3559>it<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> together the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>:
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, <S%H222>Uriel<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%>;
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%>;
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>, <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%>;
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H469>Elizaphan<s%>, <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>;
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, <S%H447>Eliel<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%>;
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>, <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and for the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, for <S%H222>Uriel<s%>, <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%>, and <S%H3100>Joel<s%>, <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, and <S%H447>Eliel<s%>, and <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7218>them<s%>, Ye are the heads of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H251>yourselves<s%>, both ye and your brethren, that ye may bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto the place that I have prepared for <S%H3559>it<s%>.

For because ye bare it not at the <S%H7223>first<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> made a <S%H6555>breach<s%> upon <S%H1875>us<s%>, for that we sought him not according to the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>.

So the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> themselves to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> upon their <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> with the <S%H4133>staves<s%> <S%H4872>thereon<s%>, as Moses <S%H6680>commanded<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> to the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H5975>appoint<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, with <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music<s%>, <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> and <S%H3658>harps<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals<s%>, <S%H8085>sounding<s%> aloud and lifting <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> with <S%H8057>joy<s%>.

So the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel<s%>; and of his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%>; and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6984>Kushaiah<s%>;

and with them their <S%H251>brethren<s%> of the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H2148>degree<s%>, Zechariah, <S%H1122>Ben<s%>, and <S%H3268>Jaaziel<s%>, and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth<s%>, and <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%>, and <S%H6042>Unni<s%>, <S%H446>Eliab<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%>, and <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%>, and <S%H4993>Mattithiah<s%>, and <S%H466>Eliphelehu<s%>, and <S%H4737>Mikneiah<s%>, and <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%>, and <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%>, the <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%>.
So the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, <S%H1968>Heman<s%>, <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, and <S%H387>Ethan<s%>, were appointed with <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> to sound <S%H8085>aloud<s%>;

and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, and <S%H5815>Aziel<s%>, and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth<s%>, and <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%>, and <S%H6042>Unni<s%>, and <S%H446>Eliab<s%>, and <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%>, with <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> set to <S%H5961>Alamoth<s%>;

and <S%H4993>Mattithiah<s%>, and <S%H466>Eliphelehu<s%>, and <S%H4737>Mikneiah<s%>, and <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%>, and <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%>, and <S%H5812>Azaziah<s%>, with <S%H3658>harps<s%> set to the <S%H8067>Sheminith<s%>, to <S%H5329>lead<s%>.
And <S%H3663>Chenaniah<s%>, <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, was over the <S%H4853>song<s%>: he <S%H3256>instructed<s%> about the <S%H4853>song<s%>, because he was <S%H995>skilful<s%>.
And <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> were <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%>.

And <S%H7645>Shebaniah<s%>, and <S%H3146>Joshaphat<s%>, and <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%>, and <S%H6022>Amasai<s%>, and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%>, and <S%H461>Eliezer<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, did <S%H2690>blow<s%> the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: and <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> and <S%H3174>Jehiah<s%> were <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%>.

So <S%H1732>David<s%>, and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H505>thousands<s%>, <S%H1980>went<s%> to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> with <S%H8057>joy<s%>.

And it came to <S%H430>pass<s%>, when God <S%H5826>helped<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H3736>clothed<s%> with a <S%H4598>robe<s%> of fine <S%H948>linen<s%>, and all the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, and <S%H3663>Chenaniah<s%> the <S%H8269>master<s%> of the <S%H4853>song<s%> with the <S%H7891>singers<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> had upon him an <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H906>linen<s%>.

Thus all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting<s%>, and with <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>cornet<s%>, and with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>, and with <S%H4700>cymbals<s%>, sounding <S%H8085>aloud<s%> with <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> and <S%H3658>harps<s%>.

And it came to <S%H727>pass<s%>, as the ark of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, that <S%H4324>Michal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> looked <S%H8259>out<s%> at the <S%H2474>window<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7540>dancing<s%> and <S%H7832>playing<s%>; and she <S%H959>despised<s%> him in her <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
